attributes.action: Don't let in any more migrants to the UK
attributes.background: Letting migrants into the UK will not help the problems in their home countrys. There is not enough housing or facilities for the UK to take in and fund them.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106477

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
